description:
Google People API is the replacement for the deprecated Google Contacts API. This plugin allows you to read an authenticated user's list of contacts, including their Names, Emails, and Phone Numbers. 

Unlike other plugins, this requests the max pageSize of 1,000 contacts so you can sync your whole contact list in one go.
name: Google People (Contacts)
plugin_instructions:
This plugin provides two API calls you can use with Bubble's [url=https://manual.bubble.io/core-resources/data/data-sources#get-data-from-an-external-api]Get data from an external API[/url] feature:

1. User Profile - this returns information from the user's own profile. This is useful with Bubble's [url=https://manual.bubble.io/core-resources/actions/account#signup-login-with-a-social-network]Signup/login with a social network[/url]  workflow action. 

2. List Contacts - this returns a list of the user's contacts and their associated info.

To use this plugin, you'll need to get a Google Account, create a project for your client, and save your OAuth 2.0 Client ID and Client Secret.

Note: to use this API in a live app in production, you'll need to request approval from Google to use the required scopes.
